languages.text: "Пробиться через лавину прошлого, накрывшую мою могилу, было непросто, шерин. Но я воскресла".
"Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."
languages.original_text: "Пробиться через лавину прошлого, накрывшую мою могилу, было непросто, шерин. Но я воскресла".

traits.locale_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “从被掩埋的过去中挣扎着走出来，这并不是件容易的事情，亲爱的。不过，我已经重获新生了。”
languages.original_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."

traits.locale_text: “从被掩埋的过去中挣扎着走出来，这并不是件容易的事情，亲爱的。不过，我已经重获新生了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしの墓を覆っていた過去の雪崩を打ち砕くのは容易ではなかったんだ。それでも、あたしは立ち上がった」
languages.original_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしの墓を覆っていた過去の雪崩を打ち砕くのは容易ではなかったんだ。それでも、あたしは立ち上がった」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Librarme de los fantasmas del pasado que cubrían mi tumba no fue tarea fácil, shereen. Pero heme aquí».
languages.original_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."

traits.locale_text: «Librarme de los fantasmas del pasado que cubrían mi tumba no fue tarea fácil, shereen. Pero heme aquí».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai eu du mal à traverser l'avalanche du passé qui recouvrait ma tombe, shereen, mais j'ai fini par y arriver. »
languages.original_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai eu du mal à traverser l'avalanche du passé qui recouvrait ma tombe, shereen, mais j'ai fini par y arriver. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es war nicht leicht, die Lawine meiner Vergangenheit auf meinem Grab abzuschütteln, Shereen. Aber ich bin auferstanden."
languages.original_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."

traits.locale_text: "Es war nicht leicht, die Lawine meiner Vergangenheit auf meinem Grab abzuschütteln, Shereen. Aber ich bin auferstanden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Geçmişin mezarımın üstünü kapayan çığını yarıp ilerlemek kolay olmadı şirinim. Nihayet yüzeye ulaştım."
languages.original_text: "Breaking through the avalanche of the past that was covering my grave was not easy, shereen. But I have risen."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişimin, mezarımın üstünü kapayan çığını yarıp ilerlemek kolay değildi şirinim. Ama yüzeye ulaştım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
